pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tukey g--h Distribution // Functions for density, cumulative density, quantile and simulation of Tukey g-and-h (1977) distributions. The quantile-based transformation (Hoaglin 1985 doi:10.1002/9781118150702.ch11) and its reverse transformation, as well as the letter-value based estimates (Hoaglin 1985), are also provided.
